import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import'./Products.scss';import MenuBar from"./Menubar";import{NavLink,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import axios from'axios';import{API_URL}from'../../config/contansts';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const Data={'prodpho':{name:'사진촬영',photo:'/image/Product/main/photo.jpg'},'prodmov':{name:'영상촬영',photo:'/image/Product/main/movie.jpg'},'prodhair':{name:'헤어&메이크업',photo:'/image/Product/main/hair.jpg'},'prodbooth':{name:'포토부스',photo:'/image/Product/main/booth.jpg'},'prodetc':{name:'축가/사회',photo:'/image/Product/main/Etc.jpg'},'prodcar':{name:'웨딩카',photo:'/image/Product/main/car.jpg'},'prodbow':{name:'폐백',photo:'/image/Product/main/bow.jpg'},'prodwdmg':{name:'웨딩관리',photo:'/image/Product/main/WdMg.jpg'}};const data=Data[id];const[productsData,setProductsData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/products/").concat(id));console.log("Product.js/response: ",response);setProductsData(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('데이터를 불러오는 도중 에러 발생:',error);}};fetchData();},[id]);const backgroundImageStyle={backgroundImage:"url(/app3".concat(data?data.photo:'',")")};// const filteredProducts = productsData.filter(product => product.category === id);
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-page1",style:backgroundImageStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:data?data.name:'아무것도 없다.'})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuBar,{categories:['prodpho','prodmov','prodhair','prodbooth','prodetc','prodcar','prodbow','prodwdmg']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"photo-cards",children:productsData.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/product/".concat(id,"/").concat(product.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photo-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:API_URL+product.imageUrl,alt:"사진"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[product.title," "]}),product.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"".concat((+product.price).toLocaleString(),"\uC6D0")})]})]})},product.id))})]});};export default Product;
